I apologize for the mistake in my previous response. Here are the valid entities that refer to "Value of material property" in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

The entities "n-doping" and "p-doping" refer to the doping levels of the material, which are properties that describe the concentration of impurities in the material. These properties are relevant to the material's electrical conductivity and are therefore relevant to the material's value for certain applications.
